title: Supergran and the Magic Ray
description: Roderick Campbell, a real Scunner of a man, has stolen Inventor Black's latest, greatest invention, a Magic Ray Machine that can turn ordinary people into super people. Frail old Granny Smith, who is watching her grandson Willy play football in Chisleton park, gets hits by the magic ray and instantly becomes Supergran, the most powerful granny in the world.

title: Supergran and the Skimmer
description: Inventor Black is warmly invited to exhibit his latest invention, the Skimmer, at the prestigious Modern Times exhibition in Chisleton. So, Supergran takes it for a test run. Once The Scunner Campbell gets wind of the new all purpose vehicle, he steals it and presents it to his former cell-mate Roly Roofless. Together they plan to use it as the ultimate getaway vehicle in a silver bouillon caper.

title: Supergran and the Course of True Love
description: Eccentric Scotish millionaire Angus McSporran comes to Chisleton to ask Supergran for his hand in marriage. Simultaniously, the Scunner Campbell is also the Black Pudding Heiress Lady Valerie Glutt. Supergran doesn't like the thought of either of these romantic pairings.

title: Supergran and the Pearl of Pinnell's End
description: The Scunner plans to grab the fabled Pearl of Pinnels End right from under the chin of Mrs. Digby Day by using Inventor Black's latest, greatest invention: the Invisible Shield.

title: Supergran and the Super Match
description: The Chisleton Athletics are facing off against the unbeatable Mighty Rovers and even with the encouragement of Supergran, it seems like the hometown boys stand no chance at all. The Scunner Campbell is also betting on the Chisleton team, because he owes Vincent Eleven 2.000 pounds by Saturday.

title: Supergran Grounded
description: The honorable Bertrand Battenburg visits Chisleton and Mad Mick of Merseyside is out to replace him with a mechanical double (and kidnap the original copy). Unfortunately, Supergran, who is supposed to protect the Battenburg boy, gets hits on the head with a log thrown by Geoff Capes and loses her superpowers. Meanwhile, the Scunner plans to get his hands on the honorable Bertie himself in order to rise up from the bottom position on the Top 50 criminals league.

title: Supergran and the Magic Ian
description: Supergran comes to the aid of The Great Renaldo (birth name: Ronald MacDonald) and his mother Clinging Ivey. Once a great magician, Renaldo lost his confidence after being tricked out of his act (and applause) by Fabulous O'Finnigan. Supergran proposes to use Inventor Black's new Manual Hypnotizer machine on Renaldo. Meanwhile, wanting to thwart the Tartan Tornado at every turn, The Scunner invites Fabulous O'Finnigan to Renaldo's comeback show.

title: Supergran and the TV Villains
description: While Supergran is taking driving lessons, the rest of Chisleton is excited about the arrival of film company Convix Pix. Little do they know that mega producer Vince van Perfect is merely the Scunner Campbell in disguise and planning to rob the Big Ben Clockshop.

title: Supergran and the Doppelganger
description: Glaswegian master of disguise Greta Garboils teams with the Scunner and dresses up like Supergran (with the Muscles posing as Willie & Edison) to commit crimes. Soon the real Supergran is arrested and put on bread and water in the Chisleton police station.

title: Supergran and the Day at the Sea
description: Supergran and Willie are enjoying a day out in Paddleton upon Sea. However the Scunner and his accomplices are also there, trying to get their hands on the widow Groggelbank's dog.

title: Supergran and the Raid on Race Day
description: Chisleton has got marathon fever. Even the Scunner and his cronies are practicing, but only so they can rob the Chisleton bank on race day.

title: Supergran and the Raving Beauty Contest
description: When Supergran organizes a Chisleton Beauty Contest, the Scunner is tasked by the head of the Gangster Guild to make sure her daughter Wanda ends up the winner.

title: Supergran and the Missing Hissing
description: The Scunner Campbell is chasing a winning lottery ticket lost by a gust of wind. Mrs. Petunia Preston is missing Cyril the Snake (actually an old vacuum cleaner hose) and now can't perform at the Orphan's Tea Party.

title: Supergran and the World's Worst Circus
description: It's five days to Christmas and the Scunner only has half a mince pie. So he has to take a job as a department store Santa. Meanwhile Supergran is trying to get down on his luck circus owner Sid Scouse back into the limelight.

title: Supergran and the Racing Cert
description: Poly Roofless, Rollie's younger brother, tells the Scunner to look after Newcastle Brown's prize winning racing pigeon, Fast Flo, in preparation of the great Chisleton pigeon race.

title: Supergran and the Treasure Trovers
description: On the day of the annual Chistleton treasure hunt, Insp. Muggins has decided that it is Unlucky Luciano's loot that is to be troved. But the Scunner is after a different treasure: the eggs of the all but extinct flying Diplodocus.

title: Supergran and the Birthday Dambuster
description: Dreaming of a life as a RAF hero, the Scunner and his palls sign up for 25 years in the Highland Laddies Regiment. But at the training ground there is not a single airplane in sight. Back in Chisleton, life just isn't the same for Supergran without the Scunner.

roles.char: The greatest flyer in all Bomber Command

title: Supergran and the Yankee Doodle's Boodle
description: The 4th of July means the start of American week in Chisleton. Scunner tries to take advantage of all the rich American tourist by posing as Livington Campbell, explorer to the stars.

roles.char: Hilda, Head of the Gangster's Guild

title: Supergran and the Rookie Recruit
description: The Chistleton Games are about to take place and the Scunner is trying his luck as an accountant. Only clumsy P.C. Derek Dumpling can stop him on his first day on the job.

title: Supergran and the State Visit
description: The Dutches of Claridge is visiting Chisleton on PC Rupert Leekie's birthday. The Scunner forces himself into the job of 'General'. Unfortunately there is a bit of a mix-up. The Scunner and the police give a royal reception to compulsive kleptomaniac Hatty the Hat at Chisleton Metro, while the actual Dutches gets no reception at all at Chisleton station. So Supergran travels to Royalton in the Skimmer to find out for sure.

title: Chisleton Street Blues
description: The Scunner is so heavily in debt that he decides to end it all. Or at least make the world think he's gone to a better place. In reality he's swam to Bird Island, just off the Chisleton coast.

title: Supergran and the School for Scoundrels
description: When Sid Scoundrel opens a Chisleton branch of his School for Scoundrels, The Scunner, his gang and all the other local crooks quickly enroll.

title: Supergran and the Media Star
description: TV sets have been exploding all over Chisleton and for once the Scunner isn't to blame, for he's desperate to become a media star himself.

roles.char: Man from the Type Writer Shop

title: Supergran Snookered
description: When the Scunner finds out unsuccessful cat burglar Catharine Burgler is a natural snooker player, he becomes her sponsor.

title: Supergran and the Fancy Dress Fanciers
description: Supergran is invited to Empress Rita von Chisleton's annual fancy dress party, but the Scunner isn't. But when a lot of stolen dresses ends up at the party by mistake, the Scunner and his boys get to dress up after all.

title: Supergran and the Chronic Crooner
description: Most of Chisleton has been deserted on account of Country & Western Week. Too late to leave town, the Scunner sets his mind on managing young hopeful Hank G. Plucker and win the big cash prize.

title: Supergran and the Heir Apparent
description: The Scunner Campbell comes into money when he claims to be the rightful heir to Roderick of Roderick, Great Sporran of the Isles. But to prove his worth, he has to spend the night in the haunted wing of Roderick's castle - on Halloween.
